title: Cast of ‘Hamilton’ Makes PC Change to ‘America the Beautiful’… And the Internet ERUPTS
text:
Email 
by Gina Cassini | Top Right News 
Many conservatives cringed when the increasingly politically correct NFL took aim at President Donald Trump by having members of the cast of ‘Hamilton,’ sing ‘America the Beautiful’ at the Super Bowl. 
The writer of the hit musical Manuel-Lin Miranda is an infamous Trump-hater who in October disgracefully called the future president a “piece of sh-t” during a Saturday Night Live monologue . In November, the cast preached at Mike Pence from the stage about diversity. 
People were hoping the cast members wouldn’t inject politics into the event. 
But then they did exactly that. 
During the singing of “America the Beautiful” when they got to the part, “And crown thy good with brotherhood,” the three women added, “and sisterhood .” Hamilton cast members add ‘sisterhood’ to lyrics of “America The Beautiful” at #SB51 pic.twitter.com/wnNB5BVVr8

But many in the crowd booed, and most people on Twitter were not as pleased… The Hamilton cast ruined America the Beautiful when they added sisterhood after brotherhood part. Patriotic songs need no edit #Superbowl
